name: YHUK™ 3-Ply Surgical Masks Type IIR (50pcs/pack)

overview.title: YHUK™ 3-Ply Surgical Masks Type IIR
overview.text: YHUK™ 3-Ply Surgical Mask Type IIR is a disposable 3-ply mask, made of nonwoven fabric which is used for medical and healthcare.

specifications.value:
Main Body: Meltdown and nonwoven fabrics
Ear loops: Elastane cord

YY/T 0469:2011
EU Standard: EN 14683: 2019 Type IIR
MDD: 93/42/EEC Standard

productDetail:
YHUK™ 3-Ply Surgical Masks Type IIR

Bacterial Filtration Efficiency (BFE): ≥ 95%
Breathing Resistance (Differential Pressure): 34.7 Pa/cm2
Microbial Cleanliness (Bioburden): Not detected
Penetration of Synthetic Blood Pressure: NONE SEEN


The product conforms to EN 14683:2019 Type IIR. It is certified by 'SGS'.
The product conforms YY/T 0469:2011. It is certified by 'Guangzhou Inspection and Certification Group Co., Ltd', a China National Accreditation Service for Conformity Assessment (CNAS) listed testing laboratory.
